title: Kalan.FrFr Joins the Show
description:
Serena Williams won her first match at the US Open, BUT Jalen thinks she’s going to pull a Tom Brady and delay retirement. The Knicks give RJ Barrett a big rookie extension… does that mean the Donovan Mitchell deal is now dead? Is it a good idea for the 49ers to keep Jimmy Garoppolo around as Trey Lance’s back-up? PLUS, the guys react ro Jim Harbaugh’s decision to name 2 starting QB’s for Michigan this year. PLUS, Kalan.FrFr joins the show to talk music, Los Angeles sports scene AND look back at his college football days.
Learn more about your ad choices. Visit megaphone.fm/adchoices
